mapper.insert: insert into waybill (waybill_no, number, unit, s_pro, s_city, e_pro, e_city, s_name, s_phone, s_address, r_name, r_phone, r_address) values (#{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ePro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update waybill set number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_pro = #{sPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_city = #{sCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_pro = #{ePro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_city = #{eCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_name = #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_phone = #{sPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_address = #{sAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_name = #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_phone = #{rPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_address = #{rAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select waybill_no, number, unit, s_pro, s_city, e_pro, e_city, s_name, s_phone, s_address, r_name, r_phone, r_address from waybill where waybill_no like #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
